DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Myofascial temporomandibular joint disorder relate symptom associate mandibular condyle temporal fossa overload secondary temporalis masseter muscle hyperactivity spasm This study examine use onabotulinumtoxinA ( Botox ) treat myofascial pain disorder patient bruxism frequently exhibit sign temporomandibular joint disorder ( TMD ) double blind cross-over randomized clinical trial inject 50 unit Botox temporalis masseter muscle 32 patient 6 month follow . The objective propose study establish safety efficacy botox treat TMD associate bruxism . By time patient reach specialist office , fail maximal conservative therapy , include non-chew diet , night guard , oral analgesic , muscle relaxant , physical therapy , portion even undergone invasive procedure , manipulation anesthesia , arthroscopy , arthroplasty surgery limit improvement recurrence . Primary outcome study 50 % reduction pain . Secondary outcomes 50 % reduction surgical therapy , 25 % increase maximal inter-incisal opening ( MIO ) . The investigator look forward work propose study
DOC.brief_title: Botox Treatment TMJ Disorder With Bruxism
DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll 32 patient myofascial TMD . Patient age 18-65 . Exclusion criterion include neuromuscular disease , prior botox injection within previous 12 month , pregnancy , fibromyalgia . All patient select outpatient clinic , complain TMJ disease associate bruxism . Screening include thorough history exam , TMJ CT scan MRI . Patients neuromuscular disorder , musculoskeletal disorder , prior Botox injection exclude . Patients already undergone conservative treatment manage 3 month conservative therapy prior become eligible . All patient inform consented participation study Botox injection . Baseline pain questionnaire , physical exam perform . Patients randomized receive normal saline botox injection . All patient crossover second set injection 3 month . All patient receive total 200 Botox unit either 0 3 month time point . In regard , patient act placebo control . Botox prepare accord manufacturer 's instruction . Briefly , lyophilize protein reconstitute preservative-free normal saline draw 1-mL syringe . While patient sit office procedure chair , 25 50 U Botox inject temporalis muscle 25 50 U Botox inject masseter muscle . The patient instruct keep head elevate 8 hour . Patients call 3 time first round injection , monitor adverse event . Patients see clinic 3 month ask fill second pain questionnaire . They also undergo second physical exam , receive second set injection ( crossover ) . Patients see clinic 6 month ask fill third pain questionnaire undergo third physical exam . Patients call 3 time second round injection , monitor adverse event . Patients see clinic 6 month ask fill third pain questionnaire undergo third physical exam
DOC.criteria: aged 1865 person diagnosis myofascial temporomandibular joint disorder refractory conservative treatment 6 month pregnancy rheumatoid arthritis ankylose spondylitis psoriatic arthritis fibromyalgia neuropathic pain pain dental origin muscle relaxant use aminoglycoside use prior Botox use neuropathic pain trigeminal neuralgia
